titleStmt.title: Souldiery spiritualized, or, The Christian souldier orderly and strenously engaged in the spiritual warre and so fighting the good fight represented in a sermon preached at Boston in New England on the day of the artillery election there, June 1, 1674 / by Joshua Moodey ...
titleStmt.author: Moodey, Joshua, 1633?-1697.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
